note:
the profile photo is a mugshot, following my arrest during an international day of protest against the G-8 summit, in Cologne, Germany. i served the longest prison sentence of anyone arrested that day, around the world. i was the most revolting man on Earth: June 18th, 1999. (see Do or Die #8)

i'm writing erotic fiction these days, about how the Earth is freed from patriarchy by a group of Goddesses, and the guys who love them.
